name: Wind-Up Rewind
description:
PLEASE READ!!!

This is my submission for the Brackeys Community Game Jam 2020.2. Your goal is to avoid the lasers and get to the key to wind it up. You can rewind time by going to the blue squares called rewind points. Use left shift to rewind on rewind points. There is no jumping by the way.

You are a scientist that has to pass through a bunch of lasers to wind up the key at the end to proceed to the next level. Good Luck!
